details.title: Effect of Single-Bit Digitization in Adaptive Array Control Loops
details.abstract: The properties of an adaptive array antenna, including transient response rate and control loop noise, depend on the intensity of the external noise field. The dependence can be reduced by 1-bit digitization of the real and imaginary parts of the signals from which the envelopes in the control loops are formed. This can be done without degrading the performance of the adaptive array.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
